LUKE 7.34 urrann sunus mans matjands jah drigkands, jah qiþiþ:
sai, manna afetja jah weindrugkja, frijonds motarje jah frawaurhtaize.
LUKE 7.35 jah gasunjoda warþ handugei fram barnam seinaim allaim.
LUKE 7.36 baþ þan ina sums Fareisaie ei matidedi miþ imma;
jah atgaggands in gard þis Fareisaiaus anakumbida.

LUKE 7.37 þaruh sai, qino in þizai baurg, sei was frawaurhta, jah ufkunnandei þatei anakumbida in razna þis Fareisaiaus, briggandei alabalstraun balsanis LUKE 7.38 jah standandei faura fotum is aftaro greitandei, dugann natjan fotuns is tagram jah skufta haubidis seinis biswarb jah kukida fotum is jah gasalboda þamma balsana.
LUKE 7.39 gasaiƕands þan sa Fareisaius, saei haihait ina, rodida sis ains qiþands:
sa iþ wesi praufetus, ufkunþedi þau, ƕo jah ƕileika so qino sei tekiþ imma, þatei frawaurhta ist.
LUKE 7.40 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du Paitrau:
LUKE 7.41 twai dulgis skulans wesun dulgahaitjin sumamma;
ains skulda skatte fimf hunda, iþ anþar fimf tiguns.
LUKE 7.42 ni habandam þan im ƕaþro usgebeina, baim fragaf.
ƕaþar nu þize, qiþ, mais ina frijod?
LUKE 7.44 jah gawandjands sik du þizai qinon qaþ du Seimona:
atgaggandin in gard þeinana wato mis ana fotuns meinans ni gaft;
iþ si tagram seinaim ganatida meinans fotuns jah skufta seinamma biswarb.
iþ si, fram þammei innatiddja, ni swaif bikukjan fotuns meinans.
LUKE 7.46 alewa haubid meinata ni salbodes;
iþ si balsana gasalboda fotuns meinans.
afletanda frawaurhteis izos þos managons, unte frijoda filu;
iþ þammei leitil fraletada, leitil frijod.
LUKE 7.49 jah dugunnun þai miþanakumbjandans qiþan in sis silbam:
ƕas sa ist saei jah frawaurhtins afletai?
LUKE 7.50 iþ is qaþ þan du þizai qinon:

LUKE 8.1 Jah warþ biþe , ei jah is wratoda and baurgs jah haimos merjands jah wailaspillonds þiudangardja gudis, jah þai twalib miþ imma, LUKE 8.2 jah qinons þozei wesun galeikinodos ahmane ubilaize jah sauhte, jah Marja sei haitana was Magdalene, us þizaiei usiddjedun unhulþons sibun, LUKE 8.3 jah Iohanna, qens Kusins, fauragaggjins Herodes, jah Susanna jah anþaros managos, þozei andbahtededun im us aiginam seinaim.
LUKE 8.4 gaqumanaim þan hiumam managaim jah þaim þaiei us baurgim gaïddjedun du imma, qaþ þairh gajukon:
LUKE 8.5 urrann saiands du saian fraiwa seinamma;
jah miþþanei saiso, sum gadraus faur wig jah gatrudan warþ, jah fuglos himinis fretun þata.
LUKE 8.6 jah anþar gadraus ana staina jah uskijanata gaþaursnoda, in þizei ni habaida qrammiþa.
LUKE 8.7 jah sum gadraus in midumai þaurniwe, jah miþuskeinandans þai þaurnjus afƕapidedun þata.
LUKE 8.8 jah anþar gadraus ana airþai godai jah uskeinoda jah tawida akran taihuntaihundfalþ.
saei habai ausona du hausjan, gahausjai.
LUKE 8.9 frehun þan ina siponjos is qiþandans,
izwis atgiban ist kunnan runos þiudinassaus gudis;
iþ þaim anþaraim in gajukom, ei saiƕandans ni gasaiƕaina, jah gahausjandans ni fraþjaina.
LUKE 8.11 aþþan þata ist so gajuko:
LUKE 8.12 iþ þai wiþra wig sind þai hausjandans;
þaþroh qimiþ diabulus jah usnimiþ þata waurd af hairtin ize, ei galaubjandans ni ganisaina.
LUKE 8.13 iþ þai ana þamma staina, ize þan hausjand, miþ faheidai andnimand þata waurd, jah þai waurtins ni haband, þaiei du mela galaubjand jah in mela fraistubnjos afstandand.
